member.name: COMPPOS
member.summary: Holds information about a component's position and size.

member.name: COMPPOS.iLeft
member.summary: The left edge of the top-left corner in screen coordinates. Set to COMPONENT_DEFAULT_LEFT to let the Shell decide the position.

member.name: COMPPOS.iTop
member.summary: The top of the top-left corner in screen coordinates. Set to COMPONENT_DEFAULT_TOP to let the Shell decide the position.

member.name: COMPPOS.fCanResize
member.summary: Set to TRUE if the component is resizable, FALSE if not.

member.name: COMPPOS.fCanResizeX
member.summary: Set to TRUE if the component is resizable in the x direction, FALSE if not.

member.name: COMPPOS.fCanResizeY
member.summary: Set to TRUE if the component is resizable in the y direction, FALSE if not.

member.name: COMPPOS.iPreferredLeftPercent
member.summary: The left edge of the upper-left corner as a percentage of screen width.

member.name: COMPPOS.iPreferredTopPercent
member.summary: The top of the upper-left corner as a percentage of screen width.
